Package dev.gruncan.spotify.objects.wrappers

Class AbstractSpotifyCompilation

java.lang.Object
dev.gruncan.spotify.webapi.objects.wrappers.AbstractSpotifyCompilation
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpotifyObject, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimplifiedChapter, SimplifiedEpisode
public abstract class AbstractSpotifyCompilation extends Object implements SpotifyObject
Represents an abstraction of a spotify complication
See Also:
  • SimplifiedChapter
  • SimplifiedEpisode
  • SpotifyImage

  • Constructor Details

      public AbstractSpotifyCompilation()

  • Method Details

    • getAudioPreviewUrl

      public String getAudioPreviewUrl()
      A URL to a 30 second preview (MP3 format) of the episode. null if not available.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      A description of the episode. HTML tags are stripped away from this field, use html_description field in case HTML tags are needed.

    • getHtmlDescription

      public String getHtmlDescription()
      A description of the episode. This field may contain HTML tags.

    • getDuration

      public int getDuration()
      The episode length in milliseconds.

    • isExplicit

      public boolean isExplicit()
      Whether or not the episode has explicit content (true = yes it does; false = no it does not OR unknown).

    • getExternalUrls

      public String getExternalUrls()
      External URLs for this episode.
      The Spotify URL for the object.

    • getHref

      public String getHref()
      A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the episode.

    • getId

      public String getId()
      The Spotify ID for the episode.

    • getImages

      public SpotifyImage[] getImages()
      The cover art for the episode in various sizes, widest first.

    • isPlayable

      public boolean isPlayable()
      True if the episode is playable in the given market. Otherwise false.

    • getLanguages

      public String[] getLanguages()
      A list of the languages used in the episode, identified by their ISO 639-1 code.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      The name of the episode.

    • getReleaseDate

      public String getReleaseDate()
      The date the episode was first released, for example "1981-12-15". Depending on the precision, it might be shown as "1981" or "1981-12".

    • getReleaseDatePrecision

      public String getReleaseDatePrecision()
      The precision with which release_date value is known.

    • getResumePoint

      public ChapterResumePoint getResumePoint()
      The user's most recent position in the episode. Set if the supplied access token is a user token and has the scope 'user-read-playback-position'.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      The object type.

    • getUri

      public String getUri()
      The Spotify URI for the episode.

    • getRestrictions

      public String getRestrictions()
      Included in the response when a content restriction is applied.
      The reason for the restriction. Supported values:
      • market - The content item is not available in the given market.
      • product - The content item is not available for the user's subscription type.
      • explicit - The content item is explicit and the user's account is set to not play explicit content.
      • payment_required - Payment is required to play the content item.
      Additional reasons may be added in the future. Note: If you use this field, make sure that your application safely handles unknown values.

    • setAudioPreviewUrl

      public void setAudioPreviewUrl(String audioPreviewUrl)
      A URL to a 30 second preview (MP3 format) of the episode. null if not available.

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription(String description)
      A description of the episode. HTML tags are stripped away from this field, use html_description field in case HTML tags are needed.

    • setHtmlDescription

      public void setHtmlDescription(String htmlDescription)
      A description of the episode. This field may contain HTML tags.

    • setDuration

      public void setDuration(int duration)
      The episode length in milliseconds.

    • setExplicit

      public void setExplicit(boolean explicit)
      Whether or not the episode has explicit content (true = yes it does; false = no it does not OR unknown).

    • setExternalUrls

      public void setExternalUrls(String externalUrls)
      External URLs for this episode.
      The Spotify URL for the object.

    • setHref

      public void setHref(String href)
      A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the episode.

    • setId

      public void setId(String id)
      The Spotify ID for the episode.

    • setImages

      public void setImages(SpotifyImage[] images)
      The cover art for the episode in various sizes, widest first.

      True if the episode is playable in the given market. Otherwise false.

      public void setResumePoint(ChapterResumePoint resumePoint)
      The user's most recent position in the episode. Set if the supplied access token is a user token and has the scope 'user-read-playback-position'.

      public void setType(String type)
      The object type.

      public void setUri(String uri)

    • setRestrictions

      public void setRestrictions(String restrictions)
      Included in the response when a content restriction is applied.
      The reason for the restriction. Supported values:
      • market - The content item is not available in the given market.
      • product - The content item is not available for the user's subscription type.
      • explicit - The content item is explicit and the user's account is set to not play explicit content.
      • payment_required - Payment is required to play the content item.
      Additional reasons may be added in the future. Note: If you use this field, make sure that your application safely handles unknown values.
